      • toJson

        public static <T extends DomainObject> java.lang.String toJson(boolean isUpdate,
                                               T... models)
        Get the list of model objects and create json as expected by the API.
        Parameters:
        isUpdate - parse object to body suitable for updates if true; for creates, otherwise
        models - models to be parsed to body
        Returns:
        json string suitable for Xively API consumption
        Throws:
        ParseToObjectException - if unable to completely parse from model to json or if models is empty or null
